meanings.definition: Preferring or thriving in a salty environment.
meanings.sent1: The halophilic bacteria happily lived in the salty sea.
meanings.sent2: The halophilic plants grew well in the salt marsh.
meanings.sent3: The halophilic fish threw a salty party in the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her love for the beach was as halophilic as the sea itself.
meanings.sent5: The halophilic creatures danced in the saltwater under the sun.

meanings.definition: Organism that thrives in high salt concentrations.
meanings.sent1: The halophilic in the lake adapted to the salty conditions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the halophilic to understand salt tolerance.
meanings.sent3: The halophilic at the beach enjoyed salty snacks all day.
meanings.sent4: In the salt mine, the halophilic worked tirelessly.
meanings.sent5: The halophilic by the Dead Sea were a unique sight to behold.
